name: Penguin Cave Rush
description:
CONTROLS

  • CLICK on the screen to fly!

DESCRIPTION

Help the penguins fly through the endless ice cave using their newly found wooden wings! Collect pebbles to upgrade and unlock new abilities, or use them in game to activate one of your penguin's powerups. Avoid fireballs, flying icicles, and ice obstacles in order to beat your highscore.

FEATURES
- Endless cave generation
- Random cave and obstacle generation means you won't fly through the same cave twice.
- 3 unique, game changing powerups available
- Collect Pebbles to unlock and upgrade abilities.
- Use pebbles in game to activate powerups
- High, Med, and Low graphics settings
- Ability to toggle vibration mode
- Unlockable Penguins and Hats
